NAME
  osmo-arfcn - Utility program for ARFCN / frequency calculations


SYNOPSIS
  osmo-arfcn [-h] [-p] [-a arfcn] [-f freq] [-u|-d]



OPTIONS
   -h  Help

   -p  PCS

   -a <arfcn>  Specify ARFCN

   -f <freq>

   -u  uplink

   -d  downlink


AUTHOR
  This manual page was written by Ruben Undheim <ruben.undheim@gmail.com> for the Debian project (and may be used by others).
